events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle that occurred on April 30th, causing significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after verifying the keywords in the initial report regarding the vehicle collision.
An agent specializing in car accident claims was assigned to handle this case to ensure an expert evaluation of the damages.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle accident and will proceed with the necessary steps.
Request for submission of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates has been sent to the claimant.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including the police report and mechanic’s repair evaluation for review.
Our investigation team has begun assessing the submitted evidence to determine fault and extent of damages from the accident.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the claimant’s vehicle damage resulted from the reported collision.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for the efficient handling of their claim.
Following acceptance of the settlement, the claim was formally approved for payment by the insurance team.
Payment was processed and issued to the claimant’s account covering the agreed settlement amount for the car repairs.
The claim has been officially closed following successful resolution and payment disbursal for the auto accident damages.
The case files and documentation related to the vehicle collision claim have been archived for record-keeping purposes.
